original_text: Know ye not what I and my fathers have done unto all the people of other lands? were the gods of the nations of those lands any ways able to deliver their lands out of mine hand?
korean_text: 나와 내 조상들이 이방 모든 백성들에게 행한 것을 너희가 알지 못하느냐 모든 나라의 신들이 능히 그들의 땅을 내 손에서 건져낼 수 있었느냐

sentences.original_text: what I and my fathers have done
unto all the people of other lands?
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 모든 땅의 백성에게 무엇을 하였는지를?

sentences.original_text: were the gods of the nations
of those lands any ways able
